Key Match Events: The White Sox scored five runs in the top of the ninth inning to take the lead and ultimately win the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Red Sox manager Alex Cora expressed frustration about the team's inability to finish the game and noted the challenges in staying in the Wild Card race.
Players like Triston Casas reflected on the team's determination to improve and the importance of small details in tight games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Richard Fitts made his Major League debut and performed well, but the Red Sox couldn't capitalize on their opportunities.
A costly fielding error by Triston Casas in the sixth inning allowed the White Sox to take momentum.
